question: Which food-delivery start-up recently acquired Uber’s food delivery platform, Uber Eats in India?
explanation:
The Indian food delivery start-up firm Zomato recently announced its acquisition of Uber’s food delivery platform, Uber Eats, in India.
According to the deal, Uber gets a 9.99% ownership in Zomato. After the acquisition, Uber Eats will discontinue its operations in India. It will also re-direct its restaurants, delivery partners, and customers using the Uber Eats apps, to the Zomato platform. This deal will cut the loss-making business of Uber and it will continue to focus on improving its ride-hailing business in India.
